title: First Preview of Paveline
content:
Paveline is one of Greater Albion's forthcoming new releases. It might best be described as a ‘punctuated’-or if you like not joined up-script. A physicist friend suggested ‘quantum script’-in the sense of coming in discrete glyphs but with thought that might be a joke to far!

In any event, it derives from a stylised adaptation of our own chief designer’s handwriting and a high resolution preview can be seen [here on our blog.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015194323/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/)
author: Rasendyll
